text: “Eghtɨ amizir odiarir patamɨn ikezir puvatɨzitam, deravɨra nɨghnigha akar dɨkɨrɨzitam gami, o akar dɨkɨrɨzir kɨnitam puram a gami, a dera. Eghtɨ gɨn amizir kam pamɨn ikiam, eghtɨ an pam an amizir akar dɨkɨrɨzim baregh aruer kamra an anogoroghan koghtɨ, amizim damuasa mɨkemezir akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam guizbangɨra a damigh.
